participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and optimistic, Jake is eager to embark on new adventures and explore new ideas.
participant_1.background: My father is a mechanic. My favorite band is muse. I work at walmart as a stocker. I am leaving for college in three months. I am vegan.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, Emily enjoys exploring the outdoors and nurturing her creative side.
participant_2.background: I am 29 years old. I enjoy hiking and riding my bicycle. My favorite band is pearl jam. I live in a suburb of boston. I am a night owl.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing great! I'm excited for college in a few months.
That's great! What are you going to study?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm interested in business or psychology.
Those are both great majors! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thank you! I hope so.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to listen to music, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
I like those things too! What are your favorite bands?
I like Muse, Coldplay, and Imagine Dragons.
I love Muse! They're one of my favorite bands too.
They're so good! I've seen them live twice.
I'm so jealous! I've never seen them live.
You should definitely see them if you get the chance. They put on a great show.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what do you do for fun?
I like to hike, bike, and play video games.
Hiking and biking sound like fun! I've never been much of a gamer, but I've been getting into it a little bit lately.
What kind of games do you like?
I've been playing a lot of Call of Duty and Minecraft lately.
I've played a little bit of Call of Duty, but I've never played Minecraft.
Minecraft is a lot of fun! It's a sandbox game where you can build whatever you want.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation!
